articles.author: Murray Kinsella
articles.title: Twickenham to host European finals with crowds of up to 10,000 people - The42
articles.description: Meanwhile, EPCR confirmed that 24 teams will take part in next season’s Champions Cup.
articles.content:
EPCR AND THE RFU have confirmed that Twickenham Stadium in London will host the Heineken Champions Cup and Challenge Cup finals on 21 and 22 May.
Crowds of up to 10,000 people will be permitted to a… [+1779 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.title: EU's Vestager Set to Accuse Apple of Unfairly Squeezing Spotify - BNN
articles.description: Apple Inc. is set for another showdown with the European Union’s antitrust chief as she escalates an antitrust probe over its App Store, more than four years after she ordered the company to pay billions of dollars in back-taxes.
articles.content: Margrethe Vestager, competition commissioner of the European Commission, gestures while speaking during an antitrust probe news conference in Brussels, Belgium, on Wednesday, Feb. 10, 2021. Aspen Pha… [+1980 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: European Super League club executives resign from Premier League committees - CNA
articles.description: Executives from five of the six English clubs involved in the controversial breakaway European Super League have resigned from their posts on various Premier League committees, Sky Sports reported on Thursday.

articles.title: Europe's Vega rocket successfully launches - News24
articles.description: Europe's Vega rocket took off overnight Wednesday from French Guiana with Earth observation satellites on board, six months after losing two satellites.
articles.content:
Europe's Vega rocket took off overnight Wednesday from French Guiana with Earth observation satellites on board, six months after losing two satellites.
